full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,YI DAM RGYUD SDE BZHI'I LHA RNAMS KYI BSAM GTAN SGRUB MCHOD BYA TSUL GYI THO YIG RAS BRIS KYI NYER BSDUS BYA TSUL BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
